descriptionNullable:
### Context

Corals bleaching is demolishing coral reefs and ultimately coral reefs become dead. A lot of aquatic life depends on corals and with the death of coral reefs, the dependant aquatic life becomes endangered. This dataset is created for the classification of bleached, healthy, and dead corals. 


### Content

The dataset contains three classes. These classes are healthy, bleached, and dead corals. 


### Acknowledgements

We wouldn't be here without the help of others. This dataset was created with the combined efforts of the authors of the manuscript titled "Bag of Features (BoF) Based Deep Learning Framework for Bleached Corals Detection".

### Reference

If you use this dataset for experimental or research purposes please give credit to the authors by citing the following article.
Jamil, S.; Rahman, M.; Haider, A. Bag of Features (BoF) Based Deep Learning Framework for Bleached Corals Detection. *Big Data Cogn. Comput.* **2021**, 5, 53. https://doi.org/10.3390/bdcc5040053
title: BHD Corals
subtitle: Corals Classification
